channel.title: I need help making a cleint for my ps
channel.description: Hey every1 i was wondering if i could get some help/ tips on making a client for my server. i got a good source, and a client, but have no idea how to bind it 2 my source and ip. (using hammachi till i can get my router set up lol. ) i dont know how to add a background or put my server name at the top. :confused: idk if this is agaisnt the rules,( if it is tell me and i will delete or whatever.) but i have scrolled through gazillz of google pages trying to find a guide, but cant seem to find one. thanks for yr time :)

item.title: I need help making a cleint for my ps
item.dc:creator: @tilduer tilduer
item.description:
@tilduer wrote:

Ty johno, i know im ignorant ( my first real ps lol ), but how DO i change it??? i donâ€™t really get all this editing the client.java thing, what bit of code in the file has the ip? thanks for yr help, (im getting the client and source now ) but as i have almost no idea of how 2 code java im a bit of a newbie in this lol. thanks again!
PS: ive heard that blurrs client is good, should i look into that?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help making a cleint for my ps

item.title: I need help making a cleint for my ps
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Easy, change the IP in your client to match the one from your server.

Good source - Winterlove V3 (Clean and Stable)
Good Client - Galkons

Read full topic
